name: Lucia

name: Oslo
description: A collection of auth-related packages written in pure JavaScript, including WebAuthn, ASN.1, CBOR, hashing, ECDSA, HMAC, RSA, HOTP/TOTP, and base16/32/64.

name: The Copenhagen Book
description: A guideline on implementing auth in web applications.

name: Arctic
description: OAuth 2.0 and OIDC clients for JavaScript with 50+ providers.

name: Malta
